eu.menzerath.imwd

Class SettingsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.menzerath.imwd.SettingsManager

  • public class SettingsManager
extends Object
    The SettingsManager manages the configuration of the whole application in a single JSON-file in the user's home-directory. At the moment it is only used by the GuiApplication.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SettingsManager()
      Constructor: Opens or creates the config-file from a default-file in the application's resources.
